website_summaries.verdict: Convenient little outdoor table that includes sturdy benches made for use on the grass or beach.
pros: The 2 benches fold and store on the bottom of the table
Breaks down and sets up easily
Compact size, but still a useful 4-foot length
Includes a cross bar on the legs of the benches in order to keep them from sinking into soft ground
cons: The benches are only 10 inches wide, which is a little narrower than most benches and may not be as comfortable as others on the market

customer_reviews.title: Small, but durable
customer_reviews.text: It's a little smaller than I expected, but appears to be really durable. The reviews seem to be all over the place with this set, so I was initially concerned, but ours arrived in good condition. We needed an art table for my kids, so despite being smaller than I pictured, it works for us. I think you may want something bigger if you're looking for a table for adults. My husband and kids and I all fit at it, but there's little room left.
customer_reviews.author: brookemc

customer_reviews.title: Love this set
customer_reviews.text: Love this set! Bought to take camping. The benches store behind the table top and lock into place when you pick up the handle to carry. Fits in the storage compartment of the camper easily. The only thing is it’s fairly heavy. But it is sturdy so I can deal with it being heavy. Perfect for 2 adults or 2 adults and 2 small children. Definitely couldn’t fit 4 adults comfortably.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle L.

customer_reviews.title: Good products as expected from Lifetime.
customer_reviews.text: Good products as expected from Lifetime. One criticism is that the 10" benches are not comfortable for many people (too small) and can be a bit unstable. However, this is the nature of the design as they are trying to make these stow-able and portable. I am quite satisfied with this purchase overall..
customer_reviews.author: T. Shah

customer_reviews.title: Excellent portable picnic table
customer_reviews.text: We love this little table - comfortably seats about 4 people and perfect for camping or quickly sitting up in our yard. It is not incredibly heavy but also would not describe it as light weight. The pieces can lock together or you can carry them separately. It is a great value and very sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: J. Holden

customer_reviews.title: Great, durable, compact table set.
customer_reviews.text: This set is awesome! I bought it to take tent camping in the middle of the desert where there is nothing but a fire pit at each campsite. It worked really well. I love the compactness of this set. Folded, this table fit easily in the the trunk of my 2013 Volkswagen Passat. We were able to eat dinner on the table each night. The bench easily held the weight of my boyfriend (250 lbs). One night we ate dinner at the table with 2 adults on each bench (bench easily held the weight of 2 adults, roughly 400lbs). I’d purchase this set again. Looking forward to using it on my next camping trip.
customer_reviews.author: M.H.

customer_reviews.title: Great set, good quality
customer_reviews.text: This worked great for a beach vacation. Wasn’t too heavy to carry while walking in soft sand which can be tiring but it’s not exactly lightweight. I will say it’s more fit for kids but it can’t be too much larger or it wouldn’t be as convenient and portable as it is. Perfect for the beach to have another surface to keep things away from the sand and for the kids to have lunch. Adults can certainly sit on the benches if necessary. Will be using this set for the kids table during the holidays etc.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice table for added seating during gatherings
customer_reviews.text: We bought this bench/table combo to replace one that we had for years. Although the product is on the heavier side, it is solid and compact. Recommend for additional seating during backyard BBQs, holiday meals, or parties.
customer_reviews.author: Julie Unger

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic deal!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for the back porch, but it is sitting in my office area right now instead- being used by my daughter for homework and art! It is light and portable so I am just moving it back and forth daily, depending on the weather. It wipes down easily. It is a little smaller than I expected, but we got used to that after the first day. Comfortably seats 2 adults and 2 children- four adults, however, and it does become a bit cozy.
customer_reviews.author: James J

customer_reviews.title: Would recommend
customer_reviews.text: Great table and feels very sturdy but that is expected from lifetime products. Took it car camping recently and worked fantastic. This isn’t the lightest table but for car camping it works great.
customer_reviews.author: Vince

customer_reviews.title: Great for a
customer_reviews.text: lightweight - true to dimensions but hard to fit 4 adults at it. Great for a couple
customer_reviews.author: mtyltt82

customer_reviews.title: How do you return just one bench?
customer_reviews.text: I really like this set. Very sturdy, easy to store away and even has a carry handle. However, it arrived in a very large box and I need to replace just one bench. There is a piece of plastic stuck to one bench that is sharp. I am concerned that one of my children could get hurt. Because of the difficulty in returning the entire set, and no instructions on how to return just one bench, I am rating this set 3 stars instead of 5.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for camping, travel and parties.
customer_reviews.text: We use this product frequently! It is durable and easy to use.The benches attach to the table while folded, which makes it easy to move from place to place. It is a smaller table and can only seat about 4 adults or 5 to 6 younger kids.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley S. Says

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Great little table and benches. I love how it folds up. It was package in a box that was well cushioned. It is a little heavy but the table and bench are sturdy. Great price for a able abs two benches.
customer_reviews.author: joc630

customer_reviews.title: Well made like those larger tables
customer_reviews.text: Well made like those larger tables, sturdy. I returned the item as I wanted it to put it the end of my dining table, however the legs on either side did not alloy for the putting of side chairs under the table on either side. You would be able to put a chair at the end of the table comfortably. I only gave 4 stars instead of 5 stars for my personal reason, otherwise it is a quality product.
customer_reviews.author: j.v.

customer_reviews.title: Works for us!
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy thick plastic. Even under those in our party that are heavier it is working well. Very small, but for us that was the draw. Super easy to store flat in the back of our SUV (thus just taking only 2" of the bottom of the floor). Perfect for a family of 4.
customer_reviews.author: Daddy-o D

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Lifetime is a good company we have several of their other tables that we like very much, the set is just right for my wife and I to use as a picnic table, it is very steady and strong. We plan on taking this when we go camping. The table has a handle on the side to carry it, does have some weight to it but you are carrying a table and 2 benches at one time. I would definitely buy this again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works, what more can you ask for?
customer_reviews.text: It's a portable table and bench. It's hard plastic and stows away into a small package. We've used it as a puzzle table, an extra table while canning, and take it everywhere we go camping.
customer_reviews.author: Robert D.

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy and well made from what I see so far
customer_reviews.text: A snug fit for 4 adults but the convenient storage and transport is worth it. Very sturdy and well made from what I see so far.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for our family
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for our family of 4. We take it camping and it folds up so nice and flat so it’s easy to pack without it being in the way! We constantly get asked where we purchased the table and how nice it looks. We’ve never had any problems with it tipping over.
customer_reviews.author: Ainsle Woodward

customer_reviews.title: Nice!
customer_reviews.text: You can use this for maybe 2 adults (per bench ) depending on there size...you want something simple and cheaper for 2-4 people this isn’t bad at all! And ship rather quickly got it within a few days
customer_reviews.author: Carol Wengraitis

customer_reviews.title: I love it! Very well made
customer_reviews.text: I love it! Very well made! Sturdy! I bought mine for me to enjoy on my waterfront deck! Going to be very easy to store during hurricanes and winter weather
customer_reviews.author: Deborah H Burge

customer_reviews.title: Good buy!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect! I used this as a kids table for family picnics and birthday parties. As of now, I’m using the table portion as a desk in order to have a designated workspace to work from home. Yay 2020!
customer_reviews.author: Mrs.P

customer_reviews.title: Portable and perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Love it! I ordered this because of Covid-19. We order take out and instead of eating in the car, we set up our little table and self distance in style. It's a perfect size, easy to set up and take down.
customer_reviews.author: Jazzy Girl

customer_reviews.title: I definitely would buy this item again.
customer_reviews.text: I love this little table. It's perfect for my husband and I. We are between 170-200 pounds each. Very sturdy. Not cheaply made. It's compact, so easy to throw in and take along on an outing. It does weigh 30 pounds, so expect it to be compact and heavy to some. It also has a easy to carry handle.
customer_reviews.author: Rhonda

customer_reviews.title: Great kids craft table!
customer_reviews.text: Use this table and bench set all the time to do crafts with the toddlers, decorate eggs and have items at their level. I have not figured out how all the pieces (benches and table) store together but it’s a great product.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle B.

customer_reviews.title: Well, I fell while sitting on a bench...
customer_reviews.text: I mean, my brother and I are the only people who fell off one of the benches? Oh ok. The sturdiness is in question. We aren’t 500 lbs. other than that, good set
customer_reviews.author: A-Bo

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for camping
customer_reviews.text: We use this set while camping. It’s compact, sturdy, easy to store, and cleans easily. I’d happily buy this again, but I’m sure I won’t have to anytime soon!
customer_reviews.author: mrsjhood

customer_reviews.title: Great bench table
customer_reviews.text: Awesome product and very convenient. Can't wait to use it camping.
customer_reviews.author: Stacey LaBorde

customer_reviews.title: Well designed. Everything is expected.
customer_reviews.text: Works well. Everything is expected. One anther good thing I found was chair can fit well under desk. Well designed. Price is also good too.
customer_reviews.author: CZI

customer_reviews.title: Solid table
customer_reviews.text: Great table, very study and well made. A bit heavy for its size though
customer_reviews.author: Blaza4x4

customer_reviews.title: Good purchase
customer_reviews.text: It is kinda heavy but I like that. It is nice and stable. Perfect height for my boys who are 4 and 8
customer_reviews.author: Noel

customer_reviews.title: Great durable table.
customer_reviews.text: It's a Lifetime brand product. It definitely did not disappoint.
customer_reviews.author: Quality Vs Quantity

customer_reviews.title: Quality but heavy for the size
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy and packs away nice. It’s pretty heavy for the size
customer_reviews.author: ltg337

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with this purchase
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this purchase. Works as described. Very Sturdy and easy to operate and folds nice to pack in the RV .
customer_reviews.author: Maria Long

customer_reviews.title: Give Thanks!
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy. Works great when camping. Easy to carry, fold and store. Very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Drew

customer_reviews.title: Stores as one piece
customer_reviews.text: Liked it so much had it setup in my living room. Stores as one piece. Seats 4.
customer_reviews.author: Stanley Mulvihill

customer_reviews.title: My granddaughter LOVES it!
customer_reviews.text: Quiet a bit smaller than what I was expecting but it is still a great buy!
customer_reviews.author: S. Greenberg

customer_reviews.title: Worth buying
customer_reviews.text: It’s a good camping table and takes up very little space in my trailer when packed away. The fact that it is a American made product is a real nice thing
customer_reviews.author: Chris woodward

customer_reviews.title: They love it. It is very durable
customer_reviews.text: Bought this table for my young nephews to eat and do crafts at. They love it. It is very durable.
customer_reviews.author: Moonflower

customer_reviews.title: Handy
customer_reviews.text: This is very lightweight and portable. Fit just where I needed it to. Perfect addition for camping, home or backyard!
customer_reviews.author: Jodi

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Quailty
customer_reviews.text: We are full time RV folks and use this table set everyday. We are very pleased with the quality of this product overall, the only drawback is that it is a little heavy.
customer_reviews.author: William Fairbairn

customer_reviews.title: Great picnic set
customer_reviews.text: It’s easy to clean, and the pieces individually are lightweight. Storage and mobility are easy because both benches lock down securely when the table legs are in. This is a comfortable size for my family of 4 to sit and eat or craft.
customer_reviews.author: Amber C.

customer_reviews.title: Solid-Heavy enough not to move in use but light enough to carry as needed!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased to use with our RV. Great Quality!! Perfect size for up to 4. Stores well under our unit and is heavy enough not to move around in use but light enough to carry around as needed. The fold up benches can be used without the table!!
customer_reviews.author: James S.

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Sturdily built. Clever how benches fit under table for storage. Easy set up easy close up. Handle very convienient. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: Busy Buyer

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for adding to my existing seating and the sturdy benches are great but smaller then I had imagined.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole D

customer_reviews.title: Quality Product!
customer_reviews.text: Heavy duty, well made, thick material. Sure to last through the years and just what I needed.
customer_reviews.author: Stacey

customer_reviews.title: Save space, less to carry!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for sports team bonding, camping, and picnics. Every outdoorsy family should have this item on hand. Wished it was lighter to carry but it’s a Lifetime product so expect durability.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for a camper!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for a camper! Easy to clean and is compact for the storage compartment.
customer_reviews.author: Paulette Chapman

customer_reviews.title: Refund please respond thx so much
customer_reviews.text: I had ups pick it up as it was to big for camper when can I expect a refund thx much
customer_reviews.author: BRENDA  HARDY

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy small table excellent for many uses
customer_reviews.text: Excellent table. Used it to take food to the soldiers. Then they used it for everyday use. Very good item. Benches are small but great for a card table and camping
customer_reviews.author: Allen Sperling

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for small space
customer_reviews.text: We bought this set for our two kids to use during distance learning. It's perfect for their small workspace and we live that you can move the benches around if we need to.
customer_reviews.author: Leann M

customer_reviews.title: It took longer than expected to arrive, but other than that great product
customer_reviews.text: It took longer than expected to arrive, but other than that great product
customer_reviews.author: Felipe  Hernandez

customer_reviews.title: It's okay
customer_reviews.text: Box arrived half opened and corner was scratched up. I think It may have been a retuned item.
customer_reviews.author: Sophia

customer_reviews.title: Perfect table and benches combo
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy table and benches that fit together when it's time to transport them.
customer_reviews.author: Jim

customer_reviews.title: Just what the doctor ordered
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to set up and carry around, perfect for under the Pop Up Tent.
customer_reviews.author: MrTickets

customer_reviews.title: Great size and durability.
customer_reviews.text: I use this table at the park, camping and bbq's.
customer_reviews.author: RAMONDOS JIM

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: You can always count on quality from Lifetime. Extremely happy with the set!!
customer_reviews.author: Cameron Robertson

customer_reviews.title: great size for small family
customer_reviews.text: Great table, easy to pack. Not to heavy for trips.
customer_reviews.author: Colter

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Excellent. Just what we looking for while camping. Well made product.
customer_reviews.author: Gary L Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Arrived earlier than stated. Fits underneath our sofa & provides seating anywhere we camp!
customer_reviews.author: Sue S

customer_reviews.title: ... had to use it once and it is the perfect size for us
customer_reviews.text: Only had to use it once and it is the perfect size for us. The benches are a pretty narrow for someone my size, but for the most part pretty comfortable. Suits our needs.
customer_reviews.author: jerry Brace

customer_reviews.title: Nice set
customer_reviews.text: The set was a little different than I was expecting, but that's not a bad thing. The table is a nice size without being too big. The benches seemed a touch small, but they are comfortable and I love the way they tuck up under the table when the set is put away. The carry handle is a good touch. This set is perfect for some of the VFW and Legion projects we have.
customer_reviews.author: G. Coder

product_meta.title: Lifetime 80373 Portable Folding Camping RV Picnic Table and Bench Set, Almond
product_meta.description: The Lifetime Folding Picnic Table with Benches is the perfect addition to an outdoor bbq, picnic, tailgate party or any occasion. Constructed of uv-protected, high-density polyethylene and powder-coated steel, our table is built for the rigors of outdoor use. It is stain resistant, easy to clean, and protected against rusting and corrosion. With independent benches that conveniently attach to the bottom of the table, it’s easy to transport and store. So enjoy the quality construction and versatile design at your next get-together. Features a 42 in. x 24 in. table top with two independent benches and a folding frame. 2-year limited warranty.
feature_bullets: Benches attach to table for convenient transport and storage
Great for camping, parties, games, tailgating and more
Powder coating provides a rust-resistant all-weather finish that allows for both indoor and outdoor use
Lightweight, durable, stain-resistant surface contains UV inhibitors for added protection
Open Table Dimensions: 42 in. L x 24 in. W x 28.9 in. H, Closed Table Dimensions: 42 in. L x 24 in. W x 3.5 in. H, Bench Dimensions: 36.9 in. L x 8.5 in. W x 16.6 in. H

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.7 out of 5 stars233 ratings4.7 out of 5 stars
